Text:
Not in english.  No storyline (because not in english)
Censored as well.

Deathmarine games are japanese, so yes they are censored. There are translations for some as well as uncensores, but most of these are released by other people. Best idea is if you dont know what your doing dont download deathmarine stuff.
Try SexyBeach0 or schoolmate 2 instead anything that says it has an english patch. 
Or blame the people who try too stop games like this being made.
